name: Modus Sonum
detailed_description:
Modus Sonum is a sequencer of a new generation with the ability to process incoming audio streams and produce an accomplished musical composition.

This application is a kind of a music constructor, where you should combine various sound sources, add sound effects, adjust the pitch, volume, timbre, music size and get a final composition.

The unique architecture of the application will not leave indifferent all fans of electronic music, modular synthesizers, as well as fans of collecting schemes.

Main feautures:

  • Advanced sequencer to create music (electro, techno, hardcore, etc.)
  • Creating a melody from ready sound elements
  • Powerful sound effects to fill the composition
  • Hardcore oldschool style



Connect all the sound blocks and enjoy high-quality music with our first-class sequencer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: 2GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 200 MB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Процессор: 2.5 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 1Gb
